item.description:
Party For Cause Plus: Gifts for The Holidays/Sandy Relief NJ ~ House Party

Offering Some Gifts for The Holidays Come Socialize & Enjoy a Post Thanksgiving Evening Out.

Location in Dedham (Right Off Route 128) Bring Food, Beer, or Wine ~ Drink Responsible

At A Non-Smoking Property Call Jeff at 781-820-8057 or David at 617-548-6208 for full address, directions or any questions

Note: address for David's Place in Dedham Right Off Route 128 and Route 109 Enjoy!!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet Jeff and David at David's Place in Dedham Right Off Route 128
item.name: Gifts for The Holidays/Sandy Relief NJ ~ House Party
